description: Honeypot configuration for various services to study cybersecurity threats and vulnerabilities.

services.cve_description: Clickjacking vulnerability in Clibo Manager v1.1.9.12 due to lack of X-Frame-Options header, allowing attackers to hijack user clicks.

commands.handler: Welcome to Clibo Manager. Please log in.

plugin.prompt: User requests to log in to Clibo Manager.

services.description: SSH service vulnerable to information exposure.
services.cve_description: Local attackers can access application logs to retrieve database user credentials, leading to unauthorized access.

commands.handler: Authentication successful. Welcome to the SSH honeypot.

services.description: HTTP service vulnerable to stored XSS.
services.cve_description: Stored XSS vulnerability in ENOVIA Collaborative Industry Innovator allows arbitrary script execution in users' browsers.

commands.handler: Data submitted successfully. Processing your request.

plugin.prompt: User submits data through the web form.

services.description: TCP service vulnerable to path traversal.
services.cve_description: Rsync client vulnerability with --safe-links option allowing path traversal, which may lead to arbitrary file writes.
services.banner: Welcome to the TCP honeypot. Connection established.

services.description: SSH service vulnerable to privilege escalation.
services.cve_description: Vulnerability in AppPresser plugin allowing privilege escalation via account takeover due to improper password reset validation.

commands.handler: Password reset initiated. Please check your email.
